body:
Yes, I am aware that I need to send ban appeals such as these on the support email. As a matter of fact I have. http://prntscr.com/4kvf8g The only reason I am writing a post is because as seen from the reply, I have been told that I may get an email back, this email was sent on Saturday 6th September 2014. The only reason I am writing the forum post here is because I had no reply since that date, I am sorry for sounding impatient but I do not want to be serve a ban that I do not deserve. I have taken to the forums because more staff members seem to read posts like these and I would like to get confirmation on what the banner (Howsie22 I believe) has said why she/he banned me.
Thank you for reading.
(PS. I blocked off certain parts of the print screen so my email is hidden, I will give the name of my Skype if any staff members reading this would like to talk about this further, if not, I will not take offense.)

title: Re: Banned for Hacked Client

replies.body: Adam, we saw you speed hack. You were like sonic.

replies.body:
Adam, i had to wait for nearly 2 months to get unbanned
But now it should only take days, which is a huge improvement, so just wait.

replies.body: Why make this post completely pointless other than Attention Seeking and Lowering your chances of being unbanned

replies.body: If they were black, you would be jumped for racism.

replies.body: Sorry, but could we get some mature replies please.
replies.body_tagged: Sorry, but could we get some mature replies please.

replies.body: Plus subzero, as stated from my first message, I have sent numerous emails to the support site with no further response other than the email on the screenie.
replies.body_tagged: Plus subzero, as stated from my first message, I have sent numerous emails to the support site with no further response other than the email on the screenie.

replies.body: And to Dynamo, you shouldn't make fake accusations unless you were in the game and have supplied sufficient evidence, at no point have I 'speed hacked' the anti hack would pick that up and I would of most likely got kicked, the only hack people seem to use on this server are Killaura, anti knockback and a few others which I have not used. I use Optifine 1.7.4 to log onto Minecraft.

replies.body: Update: I have been unbanned, I thank tel6331 for doing this, I'm very grateful. I know it's hard to get evidence from bans like these. Somebody please lock this.

replies.body:
First of all, you're lucky you got a ban for only a week....most people get 62 days! :/

Anyways, stay clean and you won't be punished. Congrats on the unban.

replies.body:
Adam hacked clients are not allowed on avicus, I don't care if you did or did not use them please don't not spam our forums. Playing on avicus is a privellege don't abuse by making spammy topics about bans and unbans.

appealing takes a reasonable appeal statement and proof.

it took me 1 year to get appealed from OCN.

have some patient. After all patient is virtue. ( Jozzmcozz taught me that)
